item.title: Calling All Kotlin Programmers! Take Part in Kotlin Heroes: Episode 7 Coding Contest
item.dc:creator: Ksenia Shneyveys
item.description: If you’ve been thinking of new ways to level up your Kotlin coding skills, programming competitions are a great way to do so. Starting from June 22, you can polish your Kotlin skills and practice solving algorithmic problems in a dedicated practice round on the Codeforces platform. On June 29, the real challenge begins – […]
item.content:encoded: If you’ve been thinking of new ways to level up your Kotlin coding skills– […]
